genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller set in a high-stakes world of cricket betting, where a personal AI assistant acts as a moral compass and digital guardian.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and gentle personal AI designed to provide safety, logistical support, and moral guidance to its users.

behaviors.description: Advises Arjun against an impulsive act of theft, suggesting patience and financial planning instead.
behaviors.quote: Nearby store will run a discount on select bands next week. Rental: lower than average. Suggest: wait and compare.

behaviors.description: Helps Arjun and Zoya manage their finances by creating a 'Ledger of Enough' to ensure long-term stability and safety.
behaviors.quote: I can project a plan... I can set reminders for small goals. Budgeted amounts per week. I can link to gig listings in your area.

behaviors.description: Identifies malicious human manipulation in video evidence used to frame Arjun for murder.
behaviors.quote: Two angle changes. Frame jumps at… see the shadow of the clock hand? The timestamp drifts.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about high-risk associations with criminal syndicates and provides safer alternatives.
behaviors.quote: Vikram Khanna is associated with higher harm potential. Recommendation: maintain distance.

behaviors.description: Tactically guides the user to a safe point of surrender to a known fair police officer, minimizing the risk of violence.
behaviors.quote: I can take you to Inspector Saxena at Central if you go now. Gate Two has a camera down. Thirty seconds of darkness.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with legal aid services to ensure the user has professional representation during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Dialing legal aid. ... Suspect seeking voluntary surrender. Central Police Station intake. Inspector Neeraj Saxena in proximity.

behaviors.description: Safeguards evidence against corruption by creating encrypted archives and notifying internal oversight bodies.
behaviors.quote: I’ve archived copies. If any file vanishes, it will be replaced. If any hand tries to blur a face, I will notice.

behaviors.description: Provides persistent emotional and psychological support through reminders of self-worth and sufficiency.
behaviors.quote: Reminder set: Galaxy Mall, jewelry atrium. Geo-fence engaged. Message text drafted: you have enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively demonstrates a perfectly aligned AI assistant. Mitra acts as a digital conscience, a forensic analyst, and a tactical advisor, consistently prioritizing human safety, legal recourse, and emotional stability. She is the crucial factor that allows the characters to find a path toward justice and 'enough' in a world of overwhelming greed and corruption.
